alert.note: Alert for Aitkin; Crow Wing (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 21 at 4:29PM CDT until further notice by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Mississippi River at Fort Ripley affecting Morrison and Crow Wing Counties. Mississippi River At Aitkin affecting Aitkin and Crow Wing Counties. For the Mississippi River at Aitkin, Moderate flooding is occurring. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River At Aitkin. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, A few homes become surrounded by water in the Cedarbrook neighborhood near Eagle Rd. The Aitkin city park becomes flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 15.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:30 PM CDT Saturday was 15.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to lower, but stay above flood stage until further notice. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 15.1 feet on 06/10/1921. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Mississippi River Aitkin 13.0 15.1 Sat 3 pm CDT 14.9 14.7 14.5 &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/duluth. The next statement will be issued Sunday afternoon at 500 PM CDT.
